entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm.
